data.strFullDescription:
This Prologue is a limited version of the full game to stop waiting and jump into running your supermarket already. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your most fun supermarket experience.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Store_Management.png?t=1706285874[/img]
Design your store, optimizing for efficiency and aesthetics. Determine where products are displayed, manage your aisles, and ensure a smooth shopping experience for your customers.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Store_Management.gif?t=1706285874[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Supply_Goods.png?t=1706285874[/img]
Order stock using an in-game computer and anticipate the arrival of your next delivery. Unpack goods, organize them in your storage room and display them on shelves, fridges, and freezers.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Supply_Goods.gif?t=1706285874[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Cashier.png?t=1706285874[/img]
Read product barcodes, handle cash and credit card transactions, and ensure customers leave satisfied with their shopping and checkout experience.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Cashier_Raw.gif?t=1706285874[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Free_Market.png?t=1706285874[/img]
Navigate the complexities of a real-time market. Buy products when prices dip and determine the best-selling prices to balance customer satisfaction with profit margins.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2772560/extras/Free_Market.gif?t=1706285874[/img]

Wishlist the full game "Supermarket Simulator" where every decision matters. Will you rise to the occasion, transforming a modest establishment into a retail powerhouse, all while balancing customer satisfaction, finances, and mafia expectations?
data.strSnippet: Start running your own supermarket with Prologue already. Stock shelves, handle cashier tasks, process online orders, design & expand. Set the prices based on the market. Be prepared to face the consequences if you fail to make the nightly repayment to the gangs.
